doc.field: Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings
Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings

Monticello Raceway, Monticello, NY, 1958 (2 folders); Furnace Shrine, Sterling Forest, NY, 1959; Inwood Terrace Apartments, St. Nicholas Ave., NYC, 1959; Graymoor Seminary, Garrison, NY, 1959; Laundry for City Hospital, Kingston Ave. and Winthrop St., Brooklyn, NY, 1959; Lafayette National Bank, Brooklyn, NY, 1959; Gimbels Department Store, Roosevelt Field, NY, 1958; Loyola Hall, Fordham University, Bronx, NY, 1959; Speed Park Garage, 42nd St., NYC, 1959; B.O.A.C. (British Overseas Airway Corporation) Building, Idlewild, NY, 1959; Ivy Room, Drake Hotel, 56th St., NYC, 1959
